entry_age.max_family_size: 2 Adults + 3 Children + 4 Parents/Parents-in-law OR 6 Adults + 3 Children

special_sum_insured_rules: 75L, 100L and 200L available only up to 65 years entry age at inception.
room_rent: Up to 1% of Sum Insured or up to Rs. 20,000/- per day whichever is less (No limit, Any room)

ambulance.air: Covered up to 10% of Sum Insured per policy year

restoration_benefit: Unlimited number of times, up to 100% of Sum Insured each time, for subsequent hospitalizations. Restores immediately upon partial/full utilization. Maximum payable in a single claim is up to the Sum Insured.
no_claim_bonus: 25% of Sum Insured for each claim-free year, maximum up to 100% of Sum Insured.
wellness_program: Earn reward points and avail premium discount up to 20% on renewal premium.
preventive_health_checkup: Annual health check-up (Individual: Rs 1500-8000; Floater: Rs 2500-15000, based on SI).

waiting_periods.pre_existing: 2.5 years for 3-year policy term, 3 years for 1-year and 2-year policy terms

best_suited_for: Families seeking high sum insured including parents/parents-in-law
Individuals looking for comprehensive coverage with high sum insured options
Customers who prefer lifetime renewal and long-term policy discounts
